column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Let's break that down. It's a thin slice of cake. Then they fry it. They smear that with cream cheese icing (yessssss) and then top that with another slice of fried cake. And then they take three of these little pancreas busters and put them all on one plate. And then they serve it with syrup (which I did not use
column3: I find them bland until you sprinkle sugar on top of them. Pretty darn tasty. Its in the upper echelon of breakfast places
column5: but it's not quite in to 4 star territory. Service is fine
column6: prices are on the high side (but look at the location
column7: why do I even bring it up).
